  • IListConfigLiteral

Interface IListConfigLiteral

User config. Only use this interface in JavaScript code.

Hierarchy

  • IListConfigLiteral
    • IListConfig

Index

Properties

  • defaultFields
  • fields
  • listName
  • userFields

Properties

Optional defaultFields

defaultFields: boolean | TFieldConfigLiteral
  • Defined in src/core/list/config/IListConfigLiteral.ts:38

These fields are fields defined by the list (auto defined).

value
  • {false}: default fields will not retrieved
  • {true}: use ListBase.defaultFields
  • {Object}: overwrite ListBase.defaultFields config
  • others: retrieve specified fields. Specify user defined field in this property will not have any effect.
defaultvalue

true

Optional fields

fields: null | TFieldConfigLiteral
  • Defined in src/core/list/config/IListConfigLiteral.ts:27

Include both auto defined and user defined field. This will overwrite defaultFields and userFields if set.

value
  • {string}: only this field will be retrieved with default config
  • {INamedFieldConfigLiteral}: only this field will be retrieved with specified config
  • {Array<>}: only these fields will be retrieved with default/specified config
  • {Object}: Fields have internal names equal to this object keys will be overwrite
    • {true}: field will be add/overwrite with default config
    • {false}: field will not be retrieved
    • {IFieldConfigLiteral}: field will be overwrite with specified config
defaultvalue

null

listName

listName: string
  • Defined in src/core/list/config/IListConfigLiteral.ts:11

Display name of the list.

Optional userFields

userFields: boolean | TFieldConfigLiteral
  • Defined in src/core/list/config/IListConfigLiteral.ts:49

These fields are fields defined by the user.

value
  • {false}: all user defined will not retrieved
  • {true}: all user defined field
  • {Object}: overwrite any specified user defined field
  • others: retrieve specific field. Specify auto defined field in this property will not have any effect.
defaultvalue

true
